TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, everybody live in a stalingrade-like city

I wish that the rule 34 was false

granted, but the internet no longer exists.

I wish for muffins
Granted, RD flavor cupcake devivered by derpy

Granted, you wish for nothing, so you are nothing

I wish I could get a refund for these muffins.

Granted, but they pay you in mouldy muffins

I wish someone could tell me how the extra-planetary mod works

granted, but it dosen't work

I wish every day I didn't have to arrange the blocks

Granted, you move to America and are promptly screwed over by McCarthyism.

I wish for a bag of beef jerky.

Granted, you get ill from food poisoning

I wish for a better computer

granted, but it gets hacked.

I wish I was big on tumblr instead of having one follower :C True story, I tell you!

Granted, but they are all haters

I wish I never seen shed.mov

(Thanks for the warning, ill steer away from SHED.mov)

Granted, but then you never saw Cupcakes HD, or Rainbow factory, making your sig nonexistent, making YOU nonexistent!

I wish the world stopped hating socialism

The world became a big atoritary state (It never work)

I wish do don't talked about cupcake HD (damn it I just watched it!, It was, kinda, funny?)

I'm a psyco...

Edited October 17, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

granted instead "the rainbow factory becomes cannon...(and I just watch the cupcakes thing to...)

I wish for pie

Granted. "Oh boy, what flavor?" "Pie Flavor" [Cue action music]

I wish that 0.22 would download already...

Granted, it download so fast that your head explode

I wish the rainbow factory became cannon! (I would enjoy it, I even got a Rainbow Factory background, maybe because im a psyco, but...)

Nope, just chuck testa.

I wish you died. That's right, you!

Granted, but I become undead, hunt you down, and devour your brain.

I wish for moar cowbell.

Granted. It is 9001 Decibels... so it is essentially a FUS RO DAH

I wish for moar Hotdiggitydemon

Granted, the demon pokes you with a fork.

I wish for Baked Goods.

Granted, it's cupcake, delicious cupcake...

Inwish to gain back my sanity

(DAMMIT! I thought you'd pull a baked bads

)

Granted, but you never had sanity in the first place

I wish I could have over 100 VPKs in my tf2 custom folder without the game screwing up.

Granted, your game is fine, but your computer crashes.

I wish I had a life.

Granted. you stop playing KSP.

I wish I wasn't afraid to open my possibly corrupted save

Granted, but your save is corrupted anyway

I wish I could sing properly.

Granted, but you have awfull lyrics to sing

I wish I could make fanwork of any kind
